frontmatter.title: What is a design system?
frontmatter.subTitle: And why it is more than just a library or a style guide

meta.desc: The concept of design systems is much wider than how it is often understood. Design systems are shared practices - so they mean components and patterns; design systems are shared tools - so they mean automations and optimizations; design systems are processes - so they are in the management domain; and design systems are people - so they are about the community and collaboration.
